fact-566.value: Drax Group plc (the Company) is incorporated in England and Wales under the Companies Act. The Company and its subsidiaries (together, the Group) have three principal activities:•  Power generation;•  Gas and electricity supply to business customers; and•  Manufacturing of sustainable compressed wood pellets for use in electricity production.The Group’s activities are principally based within the UK and North America
